definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
to adhere/to stick together/to bond/to agglutinate/adhesion/adhesive

sentences.english: But in the sandy land, the change tendency of the soil moisture content is opposite to the clay land.
sentences.chinese: 而在沙土地，土壤含水量的变化趋势与黏土地相反。

sentences.english: The mucous cells secrete acid mucopolysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 黏液细胞分泌酸性黏多糖。

sentences.english: The problem of the soil consolidation after tube-pile driving was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了黏弹性土中管桩沉桩后的固结问题。

sentences.english: Variable degree of corectopia and peripheral anterior synechia occurred in all eyes.
sentences.chinese: 所有患眼均有不同程度之瞳孔异位及周边前黏连。

sentences.english: No painting or wallpapering of the wall panel is allowed.
sentences.chinese: 不得在展位墙板上涂刷油漆或黏贴墙纸。

sentences.english: The deposition of mucin in the follicle was demonstrated by Alcian blue staining.
sentences.chinese: 阿新蓝染色阳性，毛囊内可见黏蛋白沉积。

sentences.english: Collagen and mucopolysaccharide give the skin moisturizer and firming effect.
sentences.chinese: 胶原蛋白与黏多糖体供给肌肤保湿成分与紧肤效果。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of reticular erythematous mucinosis was made.
The result of toxic test showed that the toxicity of colistin E on fish was low.
sentences.chinese: 鱼毒试验显示黏菌素e对鱼的毒性为弱毒性。

sentences.english: The virus was identified initially to be a new paramyxovirus of goose.
sentences.chinese: 初步确定本病毒是未曾报道过的一新型鹅副黏病毒。

sentences.english: Like sticky capsules filled with jelly.
sentences.chinese: 就像黏黏的胶囊注满了冻糊糊。

sentences.english: Like sticky capsules filled with jelly.
sentences.chinese: 就像黏黏的胶囊注满了冻糊糊。

sentences.english: I don't like the sticky summer weather here.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢这里黏答答的夏天。

sentences.english: The town was deluged with thick slimy mud.
sentences.chinese: 该城到处都是又厚又黏的泥。

sentences.english: Collagen and mucopolysaccharide give the skin moisturizer and firming effect.
sentences.chinese: 胶原蛋白与黏多糖体供给肌肤保湿成分与紧肤效果。

sentences.english: The higher mole fraction of hydrophobe, the stronger viscosity enhancement effect.
sentences.chinese: 且疏水单元摩尔分数越高，盐增黏效应越显著。
